description:
✂  Tools & Supplies I Recommend: https://goo.gl/Y7KKhY
$  Join the "Fellowship" on Patreon: https://goo.gl/ZZ4vBf

In this TPK (Totally Practical Knowledge) I attempt to discuss my method for turning conceptual ideas into actual builds. I touch on the issues of scale, proportion, and dimension in terrain building. 

Mostly I just try to imply that you shouldn't spend much time worrying about this stuff and you should spend more time simply building, even if things end up a little screwed up.


➳  http://www.blackmagiccraft.ca

➳ Facebook: https://goo.gl/hvNgQL

➳ Join the Tabletop Crafters Guild: https://goo.gl/RMMqoh















Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

how to plan a terrain build
title: Concept to Craft: How I Plan for a Build (Black Magic Craft Episode 074)
